title: Help with tattoo font!
content:
Hey!

I'm about to make my first tattoo and I need to know the exact font of this picture. Could you please help me identify it? (See attached file).

Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Skärmavbild 2013-09-18 kl. 20.37.23.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414023103/http:/typophile.com/files/Sk%C3%A4rmavbild%202013-09-18%20kl.%2020.37.23.png) | 447.65 KB |
author: kroox

comments.content: You will have better result in the Fond ID section.
